duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze, resolve, and document conflicts of interest and compliance issues within the law firm.
Create conflicts reports and draft conflicts waivers and ethical walls when necessary.
Provide advice and guidance to attorneys regarding ethical obligations and conflicts of interest.
Conduct background research on new clients and prepare legal memoranda relating to professional responsibility and risk management.
Facilitate conflicts checks and intake processes for attorneys as required.

education_certification.credential: JD from accredited law school required – current license to practice law in US jurisdiction strongly preferred
